page.title: 18Education in Tenby area
page.content: From the Infant and Junior School's in this area the children will then go on to Greenhill Comprehensive School Tenby.Which has a large catchment area.It educates about 1300 children at the present time. There is no 11+ entrance examination as it is a Comprehensive School.We do not have a Grammer school in our area. There are no Further Education Establishments in our area.The nearest Technical Colleges are at Neyland and Haverfordwest.For College and University students travel to other parts of Wales and England.
